segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that her brother is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever seen someone get hurt from doing something like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, so calm and expectant, like she doesn’t have a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the one who put him up to this, but she’s not even helping him stay balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is right there, and she’s not even looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless she’s being, especially with the floor so slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but the girl doesn’t seem worried about getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been scolded for doing something like this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for trouble, and she’s part of the problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little sorry for her when she finally gets caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
